channel.title: Comments on: Procedures with cursors
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: i think it'd be better if you went into detail as to why set-based code performs better than a cursor or while statement.
item.content:encoded: i think it’d be better if you went into detail as to why set-based code performs better than a cursor or while statement.
